name: Singularity (itch) (DigitalCreActor)
description:
In Singularity there's only one way out!

You have to find a black hole, that brings you to the next level. Before anybody else does!

You're fighting against NPCs with different difficulties and each level challenges you more!

The temptation to explore the environment is huge, but don't get distracted, time is running out and the NPCs could be faster than you. What you're waiting for? Find your way to the next level!

Search for the black hole: The Singularity!
